plugins.name: Token Architect
plugins.description:
Token Architect is a comprehensive design token management solution that bridges the gap between Figma and your development workflow. Create, export, and import design tokens with intelligent automation and bidirectional sync capabilities.


KEY FEATURES:

  1. Generate Complete Token Systems - Create comprehensive design tokens from a single brand colour with automatic shade generation
  2. Smart Color Palette Generation - Transform any colour into professional 100-900 shade scales with HSL-based algorithms
  3. Export Figma Variables - Convert your Figma variables into industry-standard JSON tokens
  4. Import External Tokens - Bring design tokens from popular tools (Style Dictionary, Design Tokens W3C) into Figma
  5. Advanced Token Classification - Automatic organisation into primitives and semantic token hierarchies
  6. Multi-Category Support - Colours, spacing, typography, responsive breakpoints, and semantic tokens
  7. Real-time Preview & Validation - Live JSON output with comprehensive debugging capabilities


PERFECT FOR:

  1. Design system managers building tokens from scratch or maintaining consistency
  2. Frontend developers implementing design tokens in modern frameworks
  3. Teams using tools like Style Dictionary, Tokens Studio, or custom token pipelines
  4. Organisations scaling design systems across products and platforms



Please reach out to ozarg.studio@gmail.com if you have any issues or would like to request a feature. Or let's connect on LinkedIn. Cool ideas welcome :)

accepted.name: OZAR STUDIO
accepted.description: We are a design studio working worldwide . We provide a range of design and development services.

plugins.tagline: Export and Import your variables in a developer-friendy way

plugins.name: Fast Page Selector
plugins.description:
Efficient page selection and navigation when working with files containing many pages.


Features

  1. Page Grouping: Automatically group pages using Divider pages (pages starting with `---` or containing `divider`)
  2. Select by select box: Display each group in select boxes for intuitive page selection
  3. Compact View: Hide/Show functionality to minimize plugin window and efficiently utilize workspace
plugins.tagline: Navigate hundreds of pages in a flash.

plugins.name: Figma Link Exporter
plugins.description:
igmaファイル内のセクション（Section）、コンポーネント（Component）、コンポーネントセット（ComponentSet）、バリアント（Variant）を自動検出し、それぞれの直接リンクを生成するプラグインです。デザインシステムの管理や共有に最適です。

主な機能

  1. 自動検出: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、コンポーネントセット、バリアントを自動で検出
  2. 詳細情報表示: 各要素の番号、種類、名前、直接リンクを一覧表示
  3. 複数形式でエクスポート: 検出した情報をTXT、CSV、JSON形式でダウンロード可能

使用シーン

  1. デザインシステムのドキュメント作成
  2. チーム内でのコンポーネント共有
  3. 開発者へのデザイン仕様の引き渡し
  4. プロジェクト管理のための要素整理

使い方

  1. プラグインを起動
  2. 「情報を取得」ボタンをクリック
  3. 検出された要素の一覧を確認
  4. 希望の形式（TXT/CSV/JSON）を選択してダウンロード
  5. シンプルな操作で、デザインファイル内の重要な要素へのリンクを素早くエクスポートできます。
plugins.tagline: Figmaファイル内のセクション、コンポーネント、バリアントを自動検出し、それらの直接リンクをTXT/CSV/JSON形式でエクスポートできるプラグインです。

plugins.name: Tokenize Your Design
plugins.description:
Tokenize Your Design helps you bring consistency and scalability to your Figma files by automatically replacing static colors with matching token values from your design system.


✅ Key features:

•Scan your entire design file to detect non-token colors

•Match them with the color tokens from your local design system

•Maintain consistent styling across large-scale designs


Perfect for design system maintainers, developers and teams aiming to scale design efficiently.
plugins.tagline: Bring consistency to your design by mapping colors to design system tokens.

plugins.name: Bulk Certificate Generator / Generador Masivo de Certificados
plugins.description:
How does this plugin work?


Users can automate the creation of personalized certificates inside Figma, avoiding the manual copy-pasting of required data.



Step-by-step: How to use the plugin


1 - Create the base design in Figma

  1. Design a certificate inside a Frame or Component.
  2. Use text layers named like #NAME, #COURSE, #DATE, etc.
  3. These names will be automatically replaced with data from the Sheet.


2 – Prepare the Google Sheet

  1. Create a public Google Sheet.
  2. In the first row, write the field names: NAME, COURSE, DATE, ID, etc.
  3. Fill the rows with each person’s data.
  4. Make sure the document is public (set to “Anyone with the link can view”).


3 – Select your design in Figma

  1. Select the Frame or Component containing your base design.
  2. Only one selection is allowed when running the plugin.


4 – Open the plugin

  1. Run the plugin from the Figma menu.
  2. Paste the Google Sheet link.
  3. Enter the sheet name (e.g., Students).
  4. Toggle the “Show ID” option on or off if you want to hide it.


5 – Preview (optional)

  1. Click “Preview” to generate just one sample certificate.


6 – Generate certificates

  1. Click “Generate.”
  2. The plugin will clone your base design, replace the fields, and automatically arrange the certificates on the Figma page.


7 - Have fun!
plugins.tagline: Diseñá uno, generá cientos. Certificados personalizados en Figma desde un Google Sheet.

139581.name: Bulk Certificate Generator / Generador Masivo de Certificados
139581.description:

plugins.name: Motionmill
plugins.description:
Prepare Your Figma File for Development with This Plugin


This Figma plugin helps you set up a well-organized and developer-friendly design file from the start. It allows you to quickly define and document your color palette and typography styles—both as Figma styles and directly within the design file.


By standardizing colors and text styles early in the process, you create a solid foundation for a consistent visual identity and a smoother handoff to development. Developers can easily reference the documented styles and convert them into design tokens or variables in code (e.g., CSS variables or a design system setup). This includes font families, sizes, line heights, and color codes—all clearly named and structured.


This plugin is perfect for teams looking to streamline collaboration between design and development. It saves time, reduces confusion, and ensures consistency throughout the project.
plugins.tagline: Colors and Typography for Motionmill

plugins.name: LayAuto Plugin
plugins.description:
LayAuto is a responsive SVG layout generator that creates customizable grid-based designs with text and images, perfect for quick visual mockups and design assets.


This Figma plugin imports LayAuto designs by converting the SVG code into accurately positioned Figma elements, while preserving multiline text, shapes, and styling.

plugins.name: Designsystemet - Code syntax
plugins.description:
Dette er en tredjeparts plugin som kan generere CSS-syntax fra designsystemet. Den vil gå gjennom alle variablene som er tilgjengelig for designere i Figma og lage CSS-syntax som matcher den som designsystemet genererer.


På sikt ønsker vi at dette skal bli innebygd i den offisielle Designsystem pluginen. Men frem til den tiden så tilbyr vi denne som en workaround.


NB: Denne vil kun fungere med Designsystemets oppsett av Variabler


Github
plugins.tagline: Legg inn designsystemets CSS syntax med et klikk

plugins.name: View Jumper
plugins.description: View Jumper helps designers quickly navigate large Figma files by creating visual bookmarks. Users set two key locations (View A and View B) that they need to reference frequently, then instantly teleport between them with preserved zoom levels and page context. Whether using the UI buttons, menu commands, or keyboard shortcuts, this plugin eliminates the frustration of constantly scrolling and searching through complex designs, making workflow significantly more efficient when comparing or referencing different areas.

accepted.name: Christopher
accepted.description:
Product Design @ heyo.is
Brand Design @ MARKoftheBRAND.com

plugins.tagline: Set viewpoints A & B. Teleport between design locations with a click.

plugins.name: LocalizeBuddy
plugins.description:
🌏 Introducing LocalizeBuddy for Figma — Your Ultimate i18n Export Companion!


LocalizeBuddy automatically extracts every text layer from your Figma file and converts it into clean, structured JSON—perfectly formatted for any localization pipeline. Skip the tedious copy-and-paste: design and ship faster with truly seamless internationalization. ✨


Standout Features:


🔍 Comprehensive Text Discovery

Auto-detects every text node, even deep inside groups, components, and nested frames.


🔑 Smart Key Mapping

Auto-generate consistent, position-based keys that mirror your design hierarchy—e.g. page1.frame2.text3—so every JSON entry is predictably unique without relying on layer-name transformations.


📂 Structured JSON Output

Preserve your art-board and frame hierarchy in the output to keep context clear for translators.


🖼️ Frame-Only Export

Export the selected frame in one click—ideal for precise, frame-level JSON extraction.

accepted.name: Alvin Bellero
accepted.description: Crafting code and building dreams, one line at a time 👨🏻‍💻🤞🚀

plugins.tagline: Effortless export Figma text layers as structured JSON in one click—instantly accelerate i18n setup!

LocalizeBuddy automatically extracts every text layer from your Figma file and converts it into clean, structured JSON—perfectly formatted for any localization pipeline. Skip the tedious copy-and-paste: design and ship faster with truly seamless internationalization. ✨


Standout Features:

🔑 Smart Key Mapping

Auto-generate consistent, position-based keys that mirror your design hierarchy—e.g. page1.frame2.text3—so every JSON entry is predictably unique without relying on layer-name transformations.


📂 Structured JSON Output

🖼️ Frame-Only Export

133498.release_notes:

- Replace `Export to CSV` with `Export to Excel`
133498.tagline: Effortless export Figma text layers as structured JSON in one click—instantly accelerate i18n setup!

plugins.name: CTRLFRK:GRAD
plugins.description:
GRAD gives you unprecedented control over colour transitions through the power of Bezier curves. This sophisticated plugin brings laboratory-grade precision to your gradient work through highly-customisable curves. Manipulate how colours blend across HSB components, visualise transitions in real-time, and achieve interpolation paths that were previously impossible. Perfect for brand work, illustrations, and UI design where colour transitions matter.


  1. Create expressive colour gradients with precise Bezier curve control
  2. Independently manipulate hue, saturation, and brightness curves for nuanced transitions
  3. Apply preset curves (ease-in, ease-out, S-curves) for common gradient effects
  4. Visualise and fine-tune with an interactive interface
  5. Generate exact colour stops based on mathematical interpolation
  6. Apply gradients directly to selected objects or create new gradient rectangles
plugins.tagline: Precision gradient control for the colour obsessed

plugins.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
plugins.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.
plugins.tagline: Automate. Validate. Elevate.

127028.name: Quanta Symphony Design Review
127028.description:
The Automated Design Review Checklist ensures that UI/UX designs maintain high standards of organization, accessibility, layout, and content quality. It systematically evaluates design files to identify potential issues and improve usability.


In terms of Layer Organization, it checks for clear and descriptive layer names, flagging defaults like “Rectangle 1,” “Text 1,” “Frame,” or “Group.” It also detects hidden layers, ensures layers used as masks are correctly applied, and verifies the presence of effects to maintain design consistency.


For Accessibility, the checklist validates text contrast ratios against WCAG 2.1 standards to ensure readability:

•Regular text (< 18px) must have a minimum contrast ratio of 4.5:1.

•Large text (≥ 18px or ≥ 14px bold) should meet a minimum contrast ratio of 3:1.

It also warns if text size is below 14px, flags elements smaller than 24x24px (as they might be too small for touch targets), and checks for opacity settings that could impact visibility.


The Layout Review identifies problematic scale constraints that could cause resizing issues and evaluates layer dimensions to ensure usability across different screen sizes.


In terms of Content, the system detects empty text layers that may indicate missing information and checks text properties to maintain proper styling, readability, and hierarchy.


By automating these design checks, this system helps designers streamline their workflow, ensuring consistency, accessibility, and overall design quality before final delivery.

networkAccess.reasoning: The plugin needs to access external resources for WCAG contrast checking and design pattern validation.

Fill Swap

Effortlessly swap in and out fills and remix your designs with randomized solid colors, gradients, images, and more — without moving or disrupting your layout. It’s the ultimate productivity hack for mood boards, prototypes, and rapid design exploration. Fast, fun, and non-destructive.


Try it for free, and see what clicks.

Try it for free, and see what clicks.

plugins.name: Outset Pr Invoice Plugin
plugins.description:
Invoice Filler Plugin for Outset PR


This plugin is specifically designed for Outset PR and works exclusively with their internal invoice template in Figma. It automates the process of populating the template with data submitted via the plugin’s form, streamlining the invoicing workflow for the company.


How It Works:


The plugin is built to integrate with a single invoice template used by Outset PR.

Users submit invoice data through the plugin's form.

The plugin then automatically fills the predefined fields in the Outset PR invoice template within Figma.


Limitation for Reviewers:


Since the plugin is tailored for Outset PR's proprietary invoice template, reviewers will not have access to the template for testing.


For Figma Reviewers:


To review the functionality of the plugin, please use mock data in the form. The plugin will generate a dummy page with the entered data displayed.

If you are a member of the Figma team, please fill out the form and review the data generated by the plugin to understand its intended functionality.


Key Features:


Specifically designed for Outset PR’s invoice template, allowing users to quickly populate the template with the required data.

Simplifies the invoicing process for Outset PR by eliminating manual data entry.

Optimized for seamless integration with a single internal template used by the company.
plugins.tagline: A plugin to fill invoices

plugins.name: Diopter
plugins.description:
This plugin helps you see how you are using remote components for linked and unlinked libraries. For example, you can find mobile components in a file with only desktop explorations. With a tool like this, you can being spring cleaning now and get your files squeaky clean.


To use this plugin, you'll need to create a personal access token with read-only access to files. I needed that token to be able to get details about file libraries—e.g., library name. The first time you run the plugin, you'll be asked to paste the token.
plugins.tagline: Clearly see which components you're using and where they come from.

127509.description:

plugins.name: Scribe Guard - AI-powered Writing System Validator
plugins.description:
🎯 What is it?

A powerful AI tool that analyzes your text content against your writing system guidelines, ensuring perfect brand consistency and tone of voice alignment.


✨ Key Features

  1. AI-powered content analysis
  2. Writing system validation
  3. Style guide compliance checks
  4. Tone of voice verification
  5. Terminology consistency
  6. Real-time feedback


🚀 How to Use

  1. Upload your Writing System PDF
  2. Enter your ChatGPT API key
  3. Click "Analyze Copy"
  4. Review the detailed analysis


🛠️ What You'll Need

  1. ChatGPT API key
  2. Your writing system guidelines in PDF


🔒 Security Note

Your API key is handled securely and can be saved locally for convenience. All communications are encrypted and only happen through authorized channels.



The tool provides detailed feedback on tone, terminology, and style compliance, helping you maintain perfect brand consistency across all your content. No more manual checking - let AI do the heavy lifting! ✨
plugins.tagline: Validate your text content against writing system guidelines with AI-powered analysis

plugins.name: Figmata
plugins.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.
plugins.tagline: Data-driven design directly in Figma

130087.name: Figmata
130087.description: Figmata is a tool that brings data visualization into the Figma environment, letting designers map data directly onto design elements with live, visual feedback. Unlike rigid chart tools like Excel or Illustrator, Figmata enables custom, flexible, and interactive graphics—integrated into the design systems designers already use. It lowers the barrier to entry compared to D3 by working within Figma's component-based structure and offering code autocompletion for advanced users. Figmata supports CSV/JSON input, direct manipulation of visual properties, and saves state for iterative work. It bridges the gap between data and UI design, making data-rich interfaces more intuitive and design-friendly.

plugins.name: Template Manager
plugins.description:
Figma Template Saver


Description:

Effortlessly save and reuse entire Figma designs as templates while preserving frames, text, vectors, components, and precise positioning. This plugin ensures that every detail—fills, strokes, corner radius, and vector data—is accurately stored and replicated when applied to new files.


🔹 **Save any selection as a reusable template**

🔹 **Apply templates across different files with full fidelity**

🔹 **Preserve component instances, nested frames, vectors, and typography**

🔹 **Avoid missing fills or strokes with advanced capture logic**


Streamline your workflow and bring consistency to your designs—save once, apply anywhere! 🚀
plugins.tagline: **"Effortlessly save, reuse, and replicate Figma designs—preserve every detail with precision."**

plugins.name: Update Genres Usage
plugins.description:
The page must have at least one of the following section hierarchies with the following names and elements within them:


- info (section)
    - genre (section)
        - genre name (shape with text)   <----|
    - game (section)                      (connection)
        - game name (shape with text)    <----|



Genre name must be connected to shapes containing game names and only to them.




For example we have such structure:




"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________




After the update, it will look like this


"info" section _______________________________________
|
| "genre" section _________________________
| |                                       |
| |  "genre name 1"        "genre name 2" |
| |     (2/2)                   (1/2)     |
| |_________|_____________________|________
|           |-------------------> |
| "game" s._|____       "game" s._|_____
| |         v   |       |         v    |
| | "game name1"|       | "game name2" |
| |______________       |_______________
|
|_______________________________________________
plugins.tagline: Update Genres Usage

plugins.name: iGradient
plugins.description:
iGradient helps users create advanced, customizable gradients directly inside Figma. It offers powerful tools that make designing with gradients more creative, flexible, and fun.


  1. Create mesh, Bézier, and sharp gradient styles
  2. Apply unique warp effects like noise, gravity, or circular flow
  3. Manually adjust mesh points for precise control
  4. Generate or extract color palettes from images
  5. Add natural-looking noise textures
  6. Preview and apply gradients instantly to frames or images
plugins.tagline: Advanced gradient generator with mesh and warp effects.

plugins.name: FigJam Planning Card Creator
plugins.description:
Add structured planning cards to your FigJam boards for agile planning and project management. This plugin helps teams quickly create consistent planning cards with fields like objectives, dependencies, requirements, and time estimates.


Key features:

  1. Import multiple cards at once using YAML or JSON format
  2. Create custom cards with structured fields (title, objective, dependencies, requirements, estimated lift, dates)
  3. Smart placement options - add cards inside sections or below any selection
  4. Pre-formatted cards with proper styling and typography
  5. Great for setting up sprint planning, backlog grooming, and project roadmapping


Works with sections and sticky notes. Select where you want cards and choose from built-in templates, create custom cards, or paste card definitions to bulk import.


📄 YAML/JSON Templates & Examples

📖 Documentation

🏢 Made by Prelude
plugins.tagline: Create structured planning cards for agile workflows using templates or bulk import

plugins.name: Fair Colors
plugins.description:
Fair Colors is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your color workflow, helping you manage, apply, and audit colors within your designs.


Key Features:


Extract Colors: Quickly grab all unique colors from your current selection, including solid fills and gradients.

Organize Palettes: Create and manage multiple color palettes, giving them custom names for easy organization.

Apply & Replace: Effortlessly apply saved colors to selected layers or replace existing colors throughout your selection.

Smart Highlighting: Instantly highlight all layers in your canvas that use a specific color, making auditing and adjustments a breeze.

Track Changes: Identify and manage color discrepancies by generating a "Fair Colors Changes" frame that visually shows differences between your saved palette and colors found in your selection.

Export Tokenized Colors: Generate a clean, tokenized reference frame of your used colors, perfect for design system documentation or developer handoff.

Fair Color helps you maintain consistency, identify rogue colors, and accelerate your design process by putting powerful color management tools right at your fingertips.
plugins.tagline: Local Color Palette System

138007.name: Fair Colors
138007.description:
Fair Colors is a Figma plugin designed to streamline your color workflow, helping you manage, apply, and audit colors within your designs.


Key Features:


Extract Colors: Quickly grab all unique colors from your current selection, including solid fills and gradients.

Organize Palettes: Create and manage multiple color palettes, giving them custom names for easy organization.

Apply & Replace: Effortlessly apply saved colors to selected layers or replace existing colors throughout your selection.

Smart Highlighting: Instantly highlight all layers in your canvas that use a specific color, making auditing and adjustments a breeze.

Track Changes: Identify and manage color discrepancies by generating a "Fair Colors Changes" frame that visually shows differences between your saved palette and colors found in your selection.

Export Tokenized Colors: Generate a clean, tokenized reference frame of your used colors, perfect for design system documentation or developer handoff.

Fair Color helps you maintain consistency, identify rogue colors, and accelerate your design process by putting powerful color management tools right at your fingertips.
138007.release_notes: Fixed renaming saved color palettes bug.

plugins.name: Grid Forge - Create Tables using your Design System
plugins.description:
Grid Forge is a powerful Figma plugin that revolutionizes table creation by using your existing design system components. With intelligent auto layout, flexible width settings, and advanced data mapping, Grid Forge helps teams create responsive, consistent tables in seconds.


Use your own header and cell components, ensuring brand and Ul consistency. Configure columns with FIXED, HUG (with minimum width), or FILL modes, and instantly preview changes in

real-time.


Import data via CSV or Excel, map multiple fields per component, and watch as Grid Forge intelligently applies your design system to every table row saving time and maintaining design integrity across complex Uls like dashboards and forms.
plugins.tagline: Create responsive tables using your design system components, auto layout, and real data
